anuradhapura bandhanagaraye dirgha kalayaka sita siradanduwam windimin siti sirakaruwan kipadenaku wisin jangama durakathana magin wiwidha pradeshawala wesena pudgalayinta maraniya tharjanaya kara kappam mudal banku ginumakata bara karawa ganime siddhiyak sambandhayen rahas polisiya parikshana pawathwayi.ema kappam mudal liyanage prasad ranga gunawardhanata himi mihinthale lanka bankuwe anka 7758470 darana ginumata barakarana lesath illa thibe.eheth mema ginumata mudal barakarana lada pudgalayan pilibandawa methek anawaranaya wi nathi athara yam tharjanathmaka durakathana amathumak hethuwen ihatha sandahan ginum ankayata mudal thanpath kala ayek wethoth aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwe samuha mankolla wimarshana anshaye sthanadhipathi wetha ho durakathana anka 011 2393621 ho 0112422176 magin amatha wisthara labadena lesata aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwe niyojya polispathi jayantha kulathilaka mahatha illa sitiyi.
meya ingirisi pitapathehi sandahan wanne pahatha dakwena aakarayatayi.
